tool_description: Provides stock data based on multiple sources such as Yahoo Finance.
name: Holistic Finance - Stock Data
title: Holistic Finance - Stock Data

api_list.name: Forex symbol
api_list.description: Returns a list of all available forex symbols
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://holistic-finance-stock-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/symbol/forex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "holistic-finance-stock-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://holistic-finance-stock-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/symbol/forex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "holistic-finance-stock-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Crypto symbol
api_list.description: Returns a list of all available crypto symbols

api_list.name: ETF symbols
api_list.description: Returns a list of all available etf symbols

api_list.name: Stock symbols
api_list.description: Returns a list of all available stock symbols

api_list.name: Historical crypto price
api_list.description: Provides historical crypto currency data.

api_list.name: Historical forex price
api_list.description: Provides historical forex data.

api_list.name: Historical stock price
api_list.description: Provides historical stock data.

api_list.name: Crypto quotes
api_list.description: Provides real-time crypto data.

api_list.name: Forex quotes
api_list.description: Provides real-time forex data.

api_list.name: Stock quotes
api_list.description: Provides real-time stock data of a single or multiple stock companies.

required_parameters.name: symbols
required_parameters.default: MSFT, PLTR, TSLA, PG, NFLX, AAPL

api_list.name: Earnings
api_list.description: Provides earnings of a single stock company.

api_list.name: Estimates
api_list.description: Provides estimates of a single stock company.

api_list.name: Grades
api_list.description: Provides grades of a single stock company.

api_list.name: Scores
api_list.description: Provides scores of a single stock company.

api_list.name: Key metrics
api_list.description: Provides either annual or quarterly key metrics of a single stock company.

api_list.name: Ratios
api_list.description: Provides either annual or quarterly ratios of a single stock company.

api_list.name: Stock ownership
api_list.description: Provides current stock ownership information.

api_list.name: Holder
api_list.description: Provides information about the current holder structure.

api_list.name: Executives
api_list.description: Provides information about the current composition of executives

api_list.name: Shares float
api_list.description: Provides the amount of current shares float.

api_list.name: Profile
api_list.description: Provides company data e.g. sector, industry, location, executives...

api_list.name: Income
api_list.description: Provides either annual or quarterly income statements of an single stock company.

api_list.name: Cashflow
api_list.description: Provides either annual or quarterly cash flow statements of an single stock company.

api_list.name: Balance
api_list.description: Provides either annual or quarterly balance sheet statements of an single stock company.
